text: hananimkkeseo eunhyeleul bepusyeossgogeudaega eunhaeleul bepul-eossdeon geuege neohui anaeleul ne gyeot-e ganjighala geuligo hananim-eul dulyeowo halago geu daega malhan geos-eul sang-gihala geuttae geudaeneun hananimkkeseo balghisilyeo haessdeon geos-eul geudae ma-eumsog-e sumgieossgo sa lamdeul-eul dulyeowo hayeoss-euna geudaega deoug dulyeowo hal geos-eun hananim ieossnola jeideuga geunyeowaui gyeolhonsaenghwal-eul kkeutnaess-eul ttae hananim-eun pil-yohan jeolchawa hamkke geunyeoleul geudaeui anaelo hayeoss-euni ineun yangjaui adeuldeul-i geunyeodeulgwa ihonhaess-eul ttae janglaee mid neun salamdeul-i geu anaedeulgwa gyeolhonham e eolyeoum-i eobsdolog ham-ila igeos eun ihaengdoeeoya hal hananim-ui myeonglyeong ieossnola
